SA15bsa0551u:3_0: nanu ko 'yaṃ apoho nāma? kimidaṃ anyasmādapohyate;
SA15bsa0551u:3_1: asmādvā anyadapohyate; asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ vāhya meva vivakṣitaṃ;
SA15bsa0551u:3_2: buddhyākāro vā; yadi vā apohanaṃ apoha ityanya vyāvṛttimātraṃ iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:3_3: na tāvadādimau pakṣau, apohanāmnā vidhereva vivakṣitatvāt;
SA15bsa0551u:3_5: tathāhi parvvatoddeśe vanhirastīti śābdau pratītirvvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate;
SA15bsa0551u:3_7: yacca pratyakṣavādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśa ityatiprasiddham /
SA15bsa0551u:4_0: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:4_3: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve 'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇāt vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām;
SA15bsa0551u:4_4: tathā nivṛttapratyayā kṣiptā nivṛttibuddhirapohapratītivyavahāramātanotīti cet? nanu sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇe vidhirūpatayā yadi sāmānyabodhavyavasthā;
SA15bsa0551u:4_6: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve 'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt,
SA15bsa0551u:4_8: anyathāsati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākārepi cetasi turagabodha ityastu /
SA15bsa0551u:5_1: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśā kārovikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu,
SA15bsa0551u:5_2: kintu gauriti pratītiḥ / tadā ca satopi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt;
SA15bsa0551u:5_4: athaivaṃ matiḥ / yadvidhirūpaṃ sphuritaṃ tasya parāpoho 'pyastīti tatpratītirucyate /
SA15bsa0551u:6_3: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam;
SA15bsa0551u:6_4: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyāt anyāpoḍhovadhāryyate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam /
SA15bsa0551u:6_6: na hi vidhiṃ pratīpadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati;
SA15bsa0551u:6_10: tathāpi nāpratipattireva, viśeṣaṇabhūtasyānyāpohasya agavāpoḍha eva gośabdasya niveśitatvāt /
SA15bsa0551u:6_11: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpala pratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryyam;
SA15bsa0551u:6_12: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt ago[']pohasphuraṇamanivāryyam /
SA15bsa0551u:6_16: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ;
SA15bsa0551u:7_0: yadapyavocadvācaspatiḥ; jātimatyo vyaktavyaḥ; vikalpānāṃ śabdānāñca gocaraḥ;
SA15bsa0551u:7_1: tāsāñca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityarthatastadavagaterna gāmbadhāneti co dito 'śvādīn badhnāti /
SA15bsa0551u:7_2: tadapyanenaiva nirastaṃ yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe 'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyavyāvṛttameva cet,
SA15bsa0551u:8_1: tathāpratītaṃ, vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthatopi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam /
SA15bsa0551u:9_5: na hi sāmānyaṃ nāma sāmānyamātramabhipretam turagepi gośabdasaṅketaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa0551u:9_6: kintu gotvam / tāvatā ca sa eva doṣaḥ / gavāparijñāne gotvasāmānyāparijñānāt /
SA15bsa0551u:9_8: tasmāt ekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvvako yaḥ sarvvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiradhya sto vikalpabudhyākāraḥ,
SA15bsa0551u:9_12: parasparavyavacchedābhāvāt, sāmānādhikaraṇyasadbhāvāt, bhūtalaghaṭābhāvavat / svābhāvena hi virodho na parābhāvenetyābālaprasiddhaṃ /
SA15bsa0551u:9_13: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva;
SA15bsa0551u:9_17: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthāeveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt tasmādapohadharmmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ;
SA15bsa0551u:9_20: kathamapoho gīyata iti cet? uktamatrāpohaśabdenānyāpohaviśiṣṭo vidhirucyate;
SA15bsa0551u:11_0: arthasya dṛṣṭāviveti, indriyaśabdasvabhāvopāyabhedāt ekasyaiva pratibhāsa bheda iti cet? atrāpyuktam /
SA15bsa0551u:13_0: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruḍdhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ;
SA15bsa0551u:13_6: dūrāsannadeśavarttinoḥ puruṣayoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhedepi na śākhibheda iti cet? na brūmaḥ pratibhāsabhedobhinnavastu niyataḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:13_9: ghaṭavat / anyatra punarnniyame naikaviṣayatāṃ pariharatītyekapratibhāso bhrāntaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:14_0: etena yadāha vācaspatiḥ; na ca śabdapratyakṣayovvastugocaratve pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteriti /
SA15bsa0551u:14_3: tanna śābde pratyaye svalakṣaṇam parisphurati kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvvātmanā pratipatteḥ,
SA15bsa0551u:14_6: asti cāstyādipadaprayogaḥ / tasmāt śabdapratibhāsasya vāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate /
SA15bsa0551u:15_0: yacca vācaspatinā jātimabdyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastu tyānanantarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate;
SA15bsa0551u:15_1: sā hi svarūpato nityāpi deśakālaviprakīrṇānekavyaktyāśrayatayā bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇībhavannastinā stisambandhayogyā;
SA15bsa0551u:15_4: tāvanna prakṛtakṣatiḥ / jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇāvācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt /
SA15bsa0551u:15_8: vyakteścet pratītisiddhiḥ, jātiradhikā pratīyatām, mā vā, na tu vyaktipratītidoṣanmuktiḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:15_14: yacceḍhaṃ na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāṃ arthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt;
SA15bsa0551u:16_0: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt;
SA15bsa0551u:16_2: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet? niraṃśatvena pratyakṣasamadhigatasya svalakṣaṇasya ko 'vakāśaḥ padāntareṇa;
SA15bsa0551u:16_4: pratyakṣe 'pi pramāṇāntarāpekṣā dṛṣṭe ti cet? bhavatu tasyāniścayātmatvāt anabhyastasvarūpaviṣaye;
SA15bsa0551u:16_5: vikalpastu svayanniścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa? asti ca śabdaliṅgāntarāpekṣā tato na vastu svarūpagrahaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:16_6_0: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmmadvāreṇa pratītepi śākhini dharmmāntaravattayā
SA15bsa0551u:16_6_1: na pratītiriti kinna bhinnā bhidhānādhī no dharmāntarasya nīlacaloccaistaratvāderavavodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:16_8: dṛśyasya dharmmadharmmibhedasya pratyakṣapratikṣiptatvā danyathā sarvvaṃ sarvvatra syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:16_13: tathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādi sambandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmmipratipattau niravaśeṣataḍvarmmapratipatti rbhavet;
SA15bsa0551u:17_0: yacca vācaspatiḥ; nacaikopādhinā sattve viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte;
SA15bsa0551u:17_3: natūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti /
SA15bsa0551u:17_6: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmmadharmmiṇoḥ pratiniyamakalpanamucitam /
SA15bsa0551u:18_1: tadabhiprāyānavagāhana phalam tathā hi tvanmate dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedaḥ upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattiḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:18_3: tat kathaṃ sūryyo pakāryyasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:18_6: asti ca, tasmānna svalakṣaṇasya śabdavikalpaliṅgapratibhāsitvamiti sthitam /
SA15bsa0551u:19_1: saritaḥ pāre gāvaścarantīti gavādiśabdāt sāsrāśṛṅgalāṅgūlādayo 'kṣarākāraparikaritāḥ sajātīyabhedāparāmarśanāt sampiṇḍitaprāyāḥ pratibhāsante /
SA15bsa0551u:21_3: asadeva vā tadrūpaṃ khyātu; vyaktaya eva vā sajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantā manubhavavyavadhānāt;
SA15bsa0551u:21_4: smṛtipramoṣo vabhidhīyatām; sarvvathā nirvviṣayaḥ khalvayaṃ sāmānyapratyayaḥ;
SA15bsa0551u:21_5: kva sāmānyavārttā? yat punaḥ sāmānyābhāve sāmānyapratyayasyākasmikatvamuktaṃ tadayuktam /
SA15bsa0551u:21_10: nāpīndriyavadasyāḥ siddhiḥ / jñānakāryyataḥ kādācitkasyaiva nimittāntarasya siddheḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:21_11: yadāpi piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet;
SA15bsa0551u:21_12: tadā śāvaleyādisakalagopiṇḍānāmevābhāvādabhāvo go buddherūpapadyamānaḥ kathamarthāntaramākṣipet? gotvādeva gopiṇḍaḥ,
SA15bsa0551u:21_14: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvam syāt /
SA15bsa0551u:21_15: tasmāt kāraṇaparamparāta eva gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā /
SA15bsa0551u:21_18: atha bhinnaṃ tadā tadeva sāmānyam nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet? abhinnaiva sā śaktiḥ prati vastu;
SA15bsa0551u:21_19: yathātvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ tatha anyopi bhavan kīdṛśandoṣamāvahati? yathā bhavatāṃ jātirekāpi samānadhvaniprasavaheturanyāpi svarūpeṇaiva jātyantaranirapekṣā /
SA15bsa0551u:21_20: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:22_0: yattu trilocanaḥ / aśvatvagotvā dīnāṃ sāmānya viśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyam;
SA15bsa0551u:24_0: iheti buddheḥ samavāyasiddhiriheti dhīśca dvayadarśane syāt /
SA15bsa0551u:25_0: etena yeyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīsu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyuhāpravarttanamasya pratyākhyātam /
SA15bsa0551u:25_4: na cānyannimittamityādi // tanna samyak / anuvṛttamantareṇāpi abhidhānapratyayānuvṛtteratadrūpaparāvṛttasvarūpaviśeṣāt avaśyaṃ svīkārasya sādhitatvāt /
SA15bsa0551u:25_5: tasmāt, tulya bhede yayā jā tiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
SA15bsa0551u:26_1: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu kiṃ daṇḍasūtrādineti /
SA15bsa0551u:26_2: tadasaṅgatam / daṇḍasūtrayohi puruṣasphaṭikapratyāsannayoḥ dṛṣṭayoḥ daṇḍisūtripratyayahetutvaṃ nāpalapyate /
SA15bsa0551u:26_4: tadyadīdaṃ parikalpanīyam tadā varam pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
SA15bsa0551u:28_9: yathā svarūpavān ghaṭaḥ / gotvaṃ sāmānyamiti vā / dvitīyapakṣe tu siddhasādhanam /
SA15bsa0551u:28_10: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimā n piṇḍa iti parikalpitam bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādgovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya /
SA15bsa0551u:28_11: tadeva na sāmānyabuddhiḥ / vādhakaṃ ca sāmānyaguṇakarmmādyupā dhicakrasya,
SA15bsa0551u:29_2: tatra na budhyākārasya tattvataḥ sambṛttyā vā vidhiniṣedhau /
SA15bsa0551u:29_4: anadhyavasāyācca / nāpi tattvato vāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau tasya śābde pratyaye 'pratibhāsanāt /
SA15bsa0551u:29_5: ataeva sarvvadharmmāṇāntattvato 'nabhilāpyatvaṃ pratibhāsādhyavasāyābhāvāt tasmāt vāhyasyaiva sāmbṛtau vidhiniṣedhau /
SA15bsa0551u:30_1: vahireva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ //
SA15bsa0551u:32_0: nanvadhyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko 'rthaḥ? apratibhāse 'pi pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtamiti yo 'rthaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:32_1: apratibhāsāviśeṣe viṣayāntaraparihāreṇa kathanniyataviṣayā pravṛttiriti cet? ucyate;
SA15bsa0551u:32_2: yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā niyataśaktitvāt niyatā eva jalādau pravṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:33_3: yenākāre vāhyasya vāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:33_4: kintarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buḍvirapaśyantyapi vāhyaṃ vāhye vṛttimātano tīti viplutaiva /
SA15bsa0551u:33_6: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam /
SA15bsa0551u:34_7: na cānaikāntikaḥ; tathāhi śabdānāmadhyavasitavijātivyāvṛttava stumātraviṣayatvamanicchadbhiḥ paraiḥ paramārthato
SA15bsa0551u:36_0: sopādhirastu yadi vā kṛtirastu buddheḥ, gatyantarābhāvāt / aviṣayatve ca vācakatvāyogāt / tatra /
SA15bsa0551u:38_0: tadevaṃ vācyāntarasyābhāvāt / viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānam vācakatvamadhyavasitavāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0551u:39_1: arthaścaiko 'dhyāsato bhāsato 'nyaḥ sthāpyo vācyastattvato naiva kaścit //
SA15bsa0551u:42_1: tatrādṛḍhe sarvvamayatnaśīrṇaṃ dṛḍhe tu sausthyannanu tāvataiva //
